subject: Officiating (Sports)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: A disputed call from Alan Kelly, a replacement official serving during Major League Soccer’s lockout of its referees, gave the Rapids a penalty kick in the Red Bulls’ 1-1 tie.
snippet: A disputed call from Alan Kelly, a replacement official serving during Major League Soccer’s lockout of its referees, gave the Rapids a penalty kick in the Red Bulls’ 1-1 tie.
